name: AsurionProtection
0:
”Alexa, Open asurion protection”
”Alexa, Ask Asurion Protection how can I reach tech support”
”Alexa, Ask Asurion Protection what is covered in my laptop plan”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: asurion protection
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Have questions about your protection plan? Ready to put your plan to use today? If so, then the Asurion Protection skill is for you. We provide you quick, simple answers to our most commonly asked questions. On top of that, we will text you quick access links to things like your plan terms and conditions and our claims platform. Need the number to reach tech support? Simply say: “Alexa, ask Asurion Protection how can I reach tech support?”.

To enable Asurion Protection, say : "Alexa, Enable Asurion Protection skill",

Some of the commonly asked questions:
“Alexa, ask Asurion Protection how can I reach tech support?”,
"Alexa, Ask Asurion Protection how do I file claim with Asurion Protection",
"Alexa, Ask Asurion Protection what is covered in my laptop plan ",

"Alexa, Open Asurion Protection. And ask questions like:
"What is covered in my laptop plan",
"How do I register my device",
"How do I find my order number",
"How do I transfer my plan to another owner",
"How does manufacturers warranty work with my plan",
"How do I get copy of my plan",
"What is not covered in my laptop plan"
"Help"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
